channel.title: Social_software on CEDIS
channel.description: Recent content in Social_software on CEDIS

item.title: Social Software
item.description: Research area involving the development and analysis of digital technologies (especially software) with the explicit goal of generating positive social impact, without profit-making or direct commercial exploitation. This approach is collaborative, interdisciplinary, and people-centered.

item.title: George Marsicano Correa
item.description: Associate Professor at the University of Brasília (UnB), working in the undergraduate Software Engineering program and the Graduate Program in Applied Computing.

item.title: Ricardo Ajax Dias Kosloski
item.description: Associative Professor at the University of Brasília (UnB), working in the undergraduate Software Engineering program.
